籤詩版本二:
Monga ngati kukokera nyalugwe kudutsa phiri lalitali, kumenyana ndi kupikisana wina ndi mzake kuti athetse kuzizira
Ukachita chinthu chabwino mwadzidzidzi osazindikira uyenera kudziteteza.Mawu akuti kukokera nyalugwe amatanthauza kukumbatira nyalugwe.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ili ngati kugwira (kukoka) nyalugwe kudutsa phiri.
Chilichonse ndi chowopsa komanso chowopsa.
解曰: Ngozi ndi yoopsa. Kutsogolo kuli zopinga. Ngati mutapempha malangizo. Ndi ntchito yovuta kwenikweni.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Wu Yuan adachoka ku Zhaoguan usiku (Wu Zixu adadutsa Zhaoguan)
Wu Zixu anali mbadwa ya Chu mu Nyengo ya Spring ndi Yophukira. Pa nthawiyo, Mfumu Ping ya Chu ankafuna kumusaka. Mfumu Ping ya Chu idapereka mphotho pakumangidwa kwa Wu Zixu, ndipo adajambula chithunzi chake ndikuchiyika pazipata za mzinda wa Chu State, ndikulamula akuluakulu kuti awonjezere kafukufuku. Pamene Wu Zixu anathaŵira ku Zhaoguan, malire a Wu ndi Chu, akuluakulu a ku Zhaoguan anafufuza mosamala kwambiri. Mwamwayi, ndinakumana ndi mwamuna wina dzina lake Dong Gao Gong, yemwe anamva chisoni ndi vuto lake ndipo anamutengera kunyumba kuti akabisale. Duke Dong Gao anali ndi mnzake yemwe amafanana ndi Wu Zixu, motero Duke Dong Gao adamupempha kuti apambane mayesowo podzinamizira kuti ndi Wu Zixu. Alonda adagwira Wu Zixu wabodza, koma Wu Zixu weniweni sakanatha kuzindikirika ndi akuluakulu chifukwa tsitsi lake lonse linali loyera, choncho adamulola kuti adutse. Pambuyo pake, adathawa bwino kupita kudera la Wu.
(Kuchotsa Wu Zixu ndi mnzako yemwe amafanana naye, komanso yemwe ali ndi imvi, ndiye "dzanja lamatsenga" la nkhaniyi)
聖意: Pemphererani nyumba yanu ndi nyumba zanu kuti zitetezeke, samalani ndi kufunafuna chuma, samalani pochita malonda, kuyimilira pakuchita malonda, mavuto m'banja.
古人: Wu Yuan adachoka ku Zhaoguan usiku (Wu Zixu adadutsa Zhaoguan)
第X籤: Chizindikiro cha makumi asanu ndi awiri mphambu zisanu
